reviewText: Still the fun goofy movie i remember.  Yes, the primary language is German if you throw it in & just hit play.  However- the original English track is there, you just need to go in to language menu & change it.  Excellent copy of this movie.
Do not buy if your expecting the wrinting on back in english does not say its in german what a let down need better description waste of money

I use to own this as a kid on
vhs and there was no stupid
knock off Star Wars text,
scrolling down in the beginning.
And no stupid slash cuts with
the trumpets
queing in the theme music to
the movie, horrible decision to
add that garage.
 Also some extra scenes that don't contribute to the tone of the  movie at all.

Awsome transfer and uncut exactly like the original vhs release not like the directors cut dvd with all the gore scenes cut out this is region free so it will play in all blu ray players oh and also just remove the german subtitles and you will be fine with this purchase

This is the ONLY fully uncut version of this movie, even the new Arrow release has the extra gore scenes removed. It is region free and has a 5.1 and 2.0 English audio track so you can play this if you live in the US.
Unless you speak German fluently don't purchase. This dubbed in German and subtitled in German. What a disappointment!
